import { faFileCirclePlus, faFilePen, faUserGear, faUserPlus, faRightFromBracket } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import CommentsMini from "../comments/commentsMini" import { useState } from "react" import { useGetEventsQuery } from "./EventApiSlice" import CountdownBar from "../../components/CountdownBar" import { useGetCommentsQuery } from "../comments/CommentApiSlice" import { useGetUsersQuery } from "../users/UserApiSlice" const EventMini = ({eventId, key}) => { const [imgHeight, setImgHeight] = useState(0); const {event} = useGetEventsQuery('eventsList', { selectFromResult: ({data}) => ({ event: data?.entities[eventId] }), }) const ownerName = "Sebastian Sigurdar" const invitedList = [ {img:"https://i.imgur.com/ouXvRND.png",}, {img:"https://i.imgur.com/ouXvRND.png",} ] return (
{}}>

{ownerName}

{event.likes}

{event.title}

{ setImgHeight(e.target.clientHeight); }}/>

{event.about}

Invited:

{invitedList.map((invited) => ( {}}> ))}
) } export default EventMini
